headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Slashes 13.6% After Swing to Net Loss
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Taking the Worst Hit. NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Wednesday. headline: In blow to some battery operators, Texas maintains non-spin reserve threshold
summary: Experts said the decision could reduce non-spin reserves on the state’s electric grid and push some players out of state.
